name: My new best Friend
description:
Escape the secret laboratory together with your newfound best buddy!

Controls:
- A/D for movement, SPACE for jumping.
- Hold down the right mouse button to open your command wheel. Choose a command on release.
- Hold down the left mouse button to gather throwing strength. Throw a ball (if you have one) on release.
- R to reset the level.
- P to pet the dog (only if he feels like it).

TIP:
As many have already noticed, throwing the ball doesn't feel too great. Sorry for that!
Try throwing the ball higher than you think you need to, especially for long distances. And don't forget to charge it before throwing!

Created by Jan Salzmann and Tim Wahrburg
Made in Godot!

Thank you and have fun! ❤️



Known Bugs:
• Sorry if you are experiencing audio-issues. Switching browsers might help!
• The wall might suck in the ball once if you're unlucky. Just reset the level with R.
